reference_a:
@article{vanwoerkom2022,
  title = {Networks of happiness: {{Applying}} a network approach to well-being in the general population},
  shorttitle = {Networks of happiness},
  author = {family=Woerkom, given=Marianne, prefix=van, useprefix=false and Constantin, Mihai and Janssens, Mayke and Reijnders, Jennifer and Jacobs, Nele and Lataster, Johan},
  date = {2022-10-01},
  journaltitle = {Journal of Happiness Studies},
  shortjournal = {J Happiness Stud},
  volume = {23},
  number = {7},
  pages = {3215--3231},
  issn = {1573-7780},
  doi = {10.1007/s10902-022-00546-x}
}
topics: happiness, well-being, affect, need for autonomy
sampling_scheme: 10x/day in 90-minute blocks with 30 to 150 minutes in between
additional_comments: no implicit missingness but timepoints seem to be missing for dropouts

features.name: cheerful
features.coding:
I feel cheerful
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
PANAS

features.name: satisfied
features.coding:
I feel satisfied
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
PANAS

features.name: happy
features.coding:
I feel happy
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
PANAS

features.name: insecure
features.coding:
I feel insecure
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
PANAS

features.name: anxious
features.coding:
I feel anxious
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
PANAS

features.name: down
features.coding:
I feel down
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
PANAS

features.name: not_tired
features.coding:
I feel tired (reverse-coded)
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Physical Feeling State Questionnaire

features.name: energetic
features.coding:
I feel energetic
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Physical Feeling State Questionnaire

features.name: satisfied_self
features.coding:
I am satisfied with myself
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Psychological Well-being Scales

features.name: inspired
features.coding:
I feel inspired
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Psychological Well-being Scales

features.name: goal_pursuit
features.coding:
I pursue my goals
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Psychological Well-being Scales

features.name: not_feels_like_obligation
features.coding:
This feels like an obligation (reverse-coded)
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Basic Psychological Need Satisfaction and Frustration Scale

features.name: chose_doing
features.coding:
I choose to do this myself
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Basic Psychological Need Satisfaction and Frustration Scale

features.name: good_at_this
features.coding:
I am good at this
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Basic Psychological Need Satisfaction and Frustration Scale

features.name: not_doubt
features.description: Not doubting if able to do this
features.coding:
I doubt that I can do this (reverse-coded)
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Basic Psychological Need Satisfaction and Frustration Scale

features.name: appreciated
features.coding:
I feel appreciated
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Basic Psychological Need Satisfaction and Frustration Scale
Only asked when not alone

features.name: part_of_company
features.coding:
I feel part of this company
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Basic Psychological Need Satisfaction and Frustration Scale
Only asked when not alone

features.name: not_misunderstood
features.coding:
I feel misunderstood (reverse-coded)
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
Basic Psychological Need Satisfaction and Frustration Scale
Only asked when not alone

features.name: social_company
features.coding:
With whom am I?
Partner
Children
Parents
Brother/Sister
Other family (not living in the same place)
Friends
Colleagues
Fellow students
Acquaintances
Strangers/Others
No one - I am alone

features.name: missing_beep
features.coding:
0 = Not missing
1 =  Missing
